subject: Parameterized improvement
msgSnippet: I was very exciting to know that JUnit 4 has Parameterized feature. I have used almost exact the same mechanism in JUnit 3.8 for making the parametrized test.

I was very exciting to know that JUnit 4 has Parameterized feature. I
have =
used almost exact the same mechanism in JUnit 3.8 for making the
parametriz=
ed test. There is one little disappoint though. Now every
parametrized meth=
od must be in separate class that is not very good.
Even if there is 2 [b]r=
elated[/b] tests it is impossible to use the
same in the single class. That=
 is because Parameterized runner expects
only one constructor. So neither a=
nother parameterized, neither
regular test can't be added. I think this sho=
uld be revisited.
